author: Vladimir  Duthiers, Paul  LaRosa, Marie  Hegwood
title: Detective believes 6-year-old's mother was killed in next room while he slept
description: For most of his life, Reggie Reed has wondered who murdered his mother Selonia Reed decades ago in Hammond, Louisiana. A fresh look at the evidence ultimately implicated the man he called his "rock" — Reginald Reed Sr., the man who lovingly raised him.
content:
It's been decades since Reginald Reed Jr., known as Reggie, last saw his mother Selonia Reed.

author: MrSun
title: Switch2能有Switch一半成功就很不錯？網熱議：疫情福利難重現 別像WiiU就好
description: 任天堂的 Nintendo Switch 2 公開後，儘管主機和遊戲的價格成為熱議話題，許多網友仍然相信任天堂粉絲會繼續支持這款產品。不過，他們直言這一代可能無法像 Switch 那樣取得成功，認為若銷量達到 Switch 的一半以上就相當不錯。有些人則認為 Switch 的成功部分來源於 COVID-19 疫情所帶來的期間福利，甚至有人擔心會重蹈 Wii U 的覆轍。
